# Matt DiMaio method

1. Flip through each page of the chapter
1. Read the End-of-chapter quiz
1. Read all **bold** print
    - Titles
    - Subtitles
    - Headings
    - Bold words
1. 1st & last sentence of each paragraph
1. Read through
